markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bracelet of Dashing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3060)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 58 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This jangling, silvery bracelet makes you lighter on your feet, giving you a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks. 

**Activate—Jangling Dash** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bracelet of Dashing
